fields.name: Notion
fields.description: Workspace app for notes, tasks, docs, and lightweight databases.

fields.name: WhisperPad
fields.description: A mobile app that converts long voice notes into organized text summaries automatically.

fields.name: LibreOffice
fields.description: Open-source office suite for word processing, spreadsheets, and presentations.

fields.name: FluxSync
fields.description: A cloud tool that keeps files synchronized across devices with version history for developers and teams.
